Package controller

Class CustomerAppointments

java.lang.Object
controller.CustomerAppointments
All Implemented Interfaces:
Navigable, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomerAppointments extends Object implements Navigable, javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for viewing the number of appointments for each customer, and allowing their counts to be filtered by appointment month or type. Fulfills the requirements for the first report in 3.f.

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Loads all of the customers and types available in the customers and types tables into their respective combo box's list of items. RUNTIME ERROR: Customer names were duplicating in the combo box until I cleared the customer names each initialization (handled in the Customers/Types classes' load methods).

      public void onFilterByType(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
